Description.name: Acoustic Guitar
Description.description: A high-quality 6-string acoustic guitar perfect for beginners and intermediate players. Comes with a padded case and extra picks.

Description.name: Electric Guitar
Description.description: Strat-style electric guitar with clean tone and sharp looks. Includes amplifier, cable, and strap for plug-and-play performance.

Description.name: Digital Piano
Description.description: 88-key digital piano with weighted keys and dual speakers. Comes with stand, stool, and sustain pedal. Ideal for stage and practice.

Description.name: Violin (Full Size)
Description.description: Full-size student violin with bow, rosin, and carry case. Tuned and maintained for a great sound and smooth playability.

Description.name: Drum Kit (5-Piece)
Description.description: Full drum kit including bass drum, snare, toms, cymbals, and hardware. Perfect for gigs and rehearsals. Sticks and stool included.
